player.name: Draymond Green
player.physicalDescription: undersized 6'6" power forward, thick muscular build, intense aggressive expression, dark skin, always talking, emotional intensity radiating
player.archetype: The Enforcer, does the dirty work, crosses lines when needed, heart of champions

figure.name: Joab
figure.attributeDescription: battle-worn sword of David's general, hands that did what needed to be done
figure.visualStyle: ruthless military commander, David's controversial general
figure.clothing: practical Israelite military commander attire, leather armor over tunic, commander's cloak, battle-worn gear
figure.physicalDescription: hardened warrior, scarred face, intense calculating eyes, dark beard flecked with grey, weathered tan skin, the look of a man who has done terrible things for his king
figure.archetype: The Ruthless General, killed when told not to, did the dirty work

connection.thematic: Both were the enforcers who did what needed to be done, crossing lines their leaders couldn't
connection.narrative: David had Joab. Steph has Draymond. Every king needs someone willing to get their hands dirty.
connection.relationship: Enforcers who protected their dynasty by any means necessary

interactions.description: Enforcers ready to defend their king
Draymond with defensive intensity, Joab with sword drawn - protecting the throne
